summary: UPDATE - This Tutorial shows you every single step you have to know to create own animations for skyrim, very simple on more than 60 sites mostly with screenshot from the programms!
descriptionHtml:
Animation Tutorial for 3DsMax
------------------------------------------

!If you find mistakes or you have still questions, just post it! :)

dont forget to post the version you used, because with the noob tutorial come some bugs. 


[FAQ]

1. Which Version can i use?
- Noob Tut - works only with 3DsMax 2012, can work with other/older versions, but i didnt tested that and it looks like it doesnt work!
- Pro   Tut - works with 3DsMax 2010 and 3DsMax2009 - confirmed

2.  .... ?

xp32 has added all his cool pro stuff, so now you can download both the more easy tutorial and the pro tutorial which clearly brings better results!

------------------
Uploaded the \"Noob Tutorial\" V1.0





Happy Modding 

xp32 and aeon
author: xp32 and aeon
